divs: Sighting DetailsWe were looking at the stars and a bright light was blinking and it was hoveringand getting closer, we didnt know what it was at first. We were all scared andmy friend pooped. please contact me I am very concerned about my dogs reaction.As it got farther away it appeared to look like a hotdog then flashed, and itwas gone.
